participant_1.background: i had cancer but its gone now. i can sew my own clothes. i've amazing children and grandchildren. i do not have a smartphone.

participant_2.background: i am a piano teacher on the side. i enjoy exploring new parts of the city. my father played violin professionally. i play several instruments.

content.text: Hi,I 'mGunnarDeatherage, I am 21. I learned to sew from my grandma when I was really, really young.
